quote_first: “Surely not!” she gibed. “Forming a link of transcontinental traffic. Helping to put a girdle ‘round the earth in eighty days–or is it forty now?–enlightening the traveling public about the
quote_last:
train; dispensing time-tables and other precious mediums of education–”
“I’m happy here,” he said doggedly.
title: Success: A Novel
author: Samuel Hopkins Adams
